mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, name, attachment) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{attachment})
mapper.select: SELECT u.no, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.attachment, ua.id, ua.name as "aname" FROM users u, (SELECT users_authority.users_no, authority.id, authority.name FROM users_authority, authority WHERE users_authority.authority_id = authority.id) ua WHERE u.no = ua.users_no AND u.no = #{no}

SELECT u.no, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.attachment, ua.id, ua.name as "aname" FROM users u, (SELECT users_authority.users_no, authority.id, authority.name FROM users_authority, authority WHERE users_authority.authority_id = authority.id) ua WHERE u.no = ua.users_no AND u.email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regdate = CURDATE(), attachment = #{attachment} WHERE no = #{no}
